    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106057</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106057</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bridging Spanish language barriers in Southern schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hohlraumbildung der spanischen Sprachbarrieren in 
den südlichen Schulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeter un pont sur les barrières linguistiques 
espagnoles dans les écoles méridionales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construindo uma ponte sobre barreiras de língua 
espanholas em escolas do sul</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gettare un ponte sulle barriere linguistiche 
spagnole in scuole del sud</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεφύρωμα των ισπανικών γλωσσικών εμποδίων στα νότια 
σχολεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Puentear barreras linguísticas españolas en 
escuelas meridionales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These articles provide background on Latino immigrants in North Carolina, administrative challenges in binational education, and strategies through which teachers can build on what Latino students bring to their classrooms to create a learning environment</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Artikel stellen Hintergrund auf Latino 
Immigranten in Nord-Carolina, administrative Herausforderungen in der 
binational Ausbildung zur Verfügung, und durch die Strategien Lehrer 
aufbauen können auf, was Latino Kursteilnehmer zu ihren 
Klassenzimmern holen, um eine erlernenumgebung zu erstellen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces articles prévoient le fond sur les immigrés 
latins en Caroline du nord, des défis administratifs dans 
l'éducation de binational, et les stratégies par laquelle des 
professeurs peuvent construire sur ce que les étudiants latins 
apportent à leurs salles de classe pour créer un environnement 
d'étude</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes artigos fornecem o fundo em immigrants de 
Latino em North.carolina, desafios administrativos na instrução do 
binational, e as estratégias com que professores podem construir em o
que os estudantes de Latino trazem a suas salas de aula para criar um 
ambiente de aprendizagem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi articoli prevedono la priorità bassa sugli
immigranti di Latino in North.carolina, sfide amministrative nella 
formazione di binational e le strategie con cui insegnanti possono 
costruire su che cosa gli allievi di Latino portano alle loro aule per
creare un ambiente imparante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα άρθρα παρέχουν το υπόβαθρο στους λατίνους 
μετανάστες στη βόρεια Καρολίνα, διοικητικές προκλήσεις στην 
εκπαίδευση binational, και τις στρατηγικές μέσω των οποίων οι 
δάσκαλοι μπορούν να στηριχτούν σε ποιοι λατίνοι σπουδαστές 
φέρνουν στις τάξεις τους για να δημιουργηθεί ένα μαθησιακό 
περιβάλλον</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos artículos proporcionan al fondo en los 
inmigrantes de Latino en Carolina del Norte, los desafíos 
administrativos en la educación del binational, y las estrategias con
la cual los profesores pueden construir en lo que traen los 
estudiantes de Latino a sus salas de clase para crear un ambiente que 
aprende</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106057</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/bridging-spanish-language-barriers-in-southern-schools</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
